phrases.phrase: Resource Check In and Out by ThemeHouse
Options for the Resource Check In and Out by ThemeHouse add-on.
This is the number of days that will be added to the current date to make the default due date when checking out an add-on.

Enter the days before and after the due date on which you would like to send reminder alerts to the user who has checked out a resource. Separate entries by a comma. For days after the due date, enter as a negative number.
Check in and out as different user
Note: the payment method used is always available as a refund payment method.
Change Check In and Out User
Check Ins and Outs Display Options
Check In and Out as User Chooser
Check In and Out Payment Methods
Please confirm that you want to delete the following condition
Please confirm that you want to delete the following location
Please confirm that you want to delete the following payment method
Refund amount must be no more than the deposit amount.
The selected refund method is not allowed to be used for this payment method.
Show all check ins and outs
Show only check ins and outs
There are no check ins or outs to display.
This user has not checked out any resources.

templates.template: {xen:phrase th_x_is_due_in_y_days_rescheckinout, 'title={xen:helper resourcePrefix, $content.resource}{$content.resource.title}', 'days={$days}'} {xen:phrase th_x_is_due_in_one_day_rescheckinout, 'title={xen:helper resourcePrefix, $content.resource}{$content.resource.title}'} {xen:phrase th_x_is_due_today_rescheckinout, 'title={xen:helper resourcePrefix, $content.resource}{$content.resource.title}'} {xen:phrase th_x_is_late_by_one_day_rescheckinout, 'title={xen:helper resourcePrefix, $content.resource}{$content.resource.title}'} {xen:phrase th_x_is_late_by_y_days_rescheckinout, 'title={xen:helper resourcePrefix, $content.resource}{$content.resource.title}', 'days={$days}'}

{xen:phrase th_search_check_outs_rescheckinout} {xen:phrase search}

{xen:phrase separate_names_with_comma}

• {xen:phrase th_resource_check_out_rescheckinout}

    {xen:helper resourcePrefix, $resource}{xen:helper highlight, $resource.title, $search.search_query, 'highlight'}

    {xen:phrase th_checked_out_to_rescheckinout}: {xen:phrase th_by_rescheckinout}: , {$checkOut.check_out_date}, {xen:phrase th_checked_in_from_rescheckinout}: {xen:phrase th_by_rescheckinout}: , {$checkOut.check_in_date}, {xen:phrase in_category}: {$resource.category_title}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase th_change_check_in_and_out_user_rescheckinout}</xen:title>
<form method="post" action="{xen:link resources/check-outs/check-in-out-as-user}" class="xenForm formOverlay" data-redirect="on">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_username">{xen:phrase user_name}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="username" id="ctrl_username" value="{$username}" class="textCtrl AutoComplete AcSingle" /> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase th_change_check_in_and_out_user_rescheckinout}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="redirect" value="{xen:if $redirect, $redirect, $requestPaths.requestUri}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:helper resourcePrefix, $resource, escaped}{$resource.title} - {xen:phrase th_check_ins_and_outs_rescheckinout}
{xen:phrase type} {xen:phrase date} ({xen:phrase th_due_date_rescheckinout}) {xen:phrase th_by_rescheckinout} {xen:phrase th_to_from_rescheckinout} {xen:phrase th_condition_rescheckinout} {xen:phrase th_location_rescheckinout} {xen:phrase th_fee_rescheckinout} ({xen:phrase th_payment_method_rescheckinout}) {xen:phrase th_deposit_rescheckinout} ({xen:phrase th_payment_method_rescheckinout})
{xen:phrase th_check_in_rescheckinout} {$checkOut.check_in_date} {xen:helper username, {xen:array "user_id={$checkOut.check_in_user_id}", "username={$checkOut.check_in_username}"}} {xen:helper username, {xen:array "user_id={$checkOut.check_in_from_user_id}", "username={$checkOut.check_in_from_username}"}} {$checkOut.check_in_condition_title} {$checkOut.check_in_location_title} {xen:phrase n_a} {xen:number {$checkOut.check_in_deposit_amount}, 2} USD ({$checkOut.check_in_deposit_refund_method_title})
{xen:phrase th_check_out_rescheckinout} {$checkOut.check_out_date} ({$checkOut.check_out_due_date}) {xen:helper username, {xen:array "user_id={$checkOut.check_out_user_id}", "username={$checkOut.check_out_username}"}} {xen:helper username, {xen:array "user_id={$checkOut.check_out_to_user_id}", "username={$checkOut.check_out_to_username}"}} {$checkOut.check_out_condition_title} {$checkOut.check_out_location_title} {xen:number {$checkOut.check_out_fee_amount}, 2} USD ({$checkOut.check_out_fee_payment_method_title}) {xen:number {$checkOut.check_out_deposit_amount}, 2} USD ({$checkOut.check_out_deposit_payment_method_title})
{xen:phrase th_there_no_check_ins_or_outs_to_display_rescheckinout}

{xen:phrase th_check_ins_and_outs_display_options_rescheckinout}

<xen:title>{xen:helper resourcePrefix, $resource, escaped}{xen:phrase th_check_in_resource_rescheckinout}: {$resource.title}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb source="$categoryBreadcrumbs" /> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:resources, $resource}">{xen:helper resourcePrefix, $resource}{$resource.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'resources/save-check-in', $resource, 'resource_check_out_id={$checkOut.resource_check_out_id}'}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator" data-redirect="on"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_in_from_username">{xen:phrase th_checked_in_from_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="check_in_from_username" id="ctrl_check_in_from_username" class="textCtrl AutoComplete AcSingle" value="{$checkOut.check_in_from_username}" /></dd> </dl>
<xen:if is="{$canChangeCheckInOutUser}"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_in_username">{xen:phrase th_checked_in_by_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="check_in_username" id="ctrl_check_in_username" class="textCtrl AutoComplete AcSingle" value="{$checkOut.check_in_username}" /></dd> </dl> </xen:if>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_in_date">{xen:phrase th_check_in_date_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="date" name="check_in_date" id="ctrl_check_in_date" class="textCtrl" value="{$checkOut.check_in_date}" /></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_in_location_{xen:if {$locations}, 'id', 'title'}">{xen:phrase th_check_in_location_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd> <xen:if is="{$locations}"> <select name="check_in_location_id" id="ctrl_check_in_location_id" class="textCtrl"> <xen:foreach loop="$locations" key="$locationId" value="$location"> <option value="{$locationId}"{xen:selected '{$checkOut.check_in_location_id} == {$locationId}'}>{$location.title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select> <xen:else /> <input type="textbox" name="check_in_location_title" value="{$checkOut.check_in_location_title}" class="textCtrl" /> </xen:if> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_in_condition_id">{xen:phrase th_resource_condition_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><select name="check_in_condition_id" id="ctrl_check_in_condition_id" class="textCtrl"> <xen:foreach loop="$conditions" key="$conditionId" value="$condition"> <option value="{$conditionId}"{xen:selected '{$checkOut.check_in_condition_id} == {$conditionId}'}>{$condition.title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_in_deposit_refund_amount">{xen:phrase th_deposit_refund_amount_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="check_in_deposit_refund_amount" value="{$checkOut.check_in_deposit_refund_amount}" size="3" class="textCtrl" id="ctrl_check_in_deposit_refund_amount"> <select name="check_in_deposit_refund_currency" class="textCtrl autoSize" id="ctrl_check_in_deposit_refund_currency"> <option value="usd">USD</option> </select> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_in_deposit_refund_method_id">{xen:phrase th_deposit_refund_method_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><select name="check_in_deposit_refund_method_id" id="ctrl_check_in_deposit_refund_method_id" class="textCtrl"> <xen:foreach loop="$refundMethods" key="$refundMethodId" value="$refundMethod"> <option value="{$refundMethodId}"{xen:selected '{$checkOut.check_in_deposit_refund_method_id} == {$refundMethodId}'}>{$refundMethod.title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" name="save" value="{xen:phrase th_check_in_resource_rescheckinout}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:phrase th_resources_checked_out_by_x_rescheckinout, 'name={$user.username}'} {xen:phrase th_check_outs_rescheckinout} {xen:link canonical:resources/check-outs, $user} {xen:phrase th_resources_checked_out_by_x_rescheckinout, 'name={$user.username}'}
{xen:phrase th_check_in_and_out_as_x_rescheckinout, 'name={$user.username}'}
    1 1 {$fromProfile}
{xen:phrase th_user_has_not_checked_out_any_resources_rescheckinout}

{xen:phrase th_user_details_rescheckinout}

{xen:phrase user}:
{xen:link canonical:resources/check-outs, $user}

<xen:title>{xen:helper resourcePrefix, $resource, escaped}{xen:phrase th_check_out_resource_rescheckinout}: {$resource.title}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb source="$categoryBreadcrumbs" /> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:resources, $resource}">{xen:helper resourcePrefix, $resource}{$resource.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'resources/save-check-out', $resource}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator" data-redirect="on"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_out_to_username">{xen:phrase th_checked_out_to_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="check_out_to_username" id="ctrl_check_out_to_username" class="textCtrl AutoComplete AcSingle" value="{$checkOut.check_out_to_username}" /></dd> </dl>
<xen:if is="{$canChangeCheckInOutUser}"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_out_username">{xen:phrase th_checked_out_by_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="check_out_username" id="ctrl_check_out_username" class="textCtrl AutoComplete AcSingle" value="{$checkOut.check_out_username}" /></dd> </dl> </xen:if>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_out_date">{xen:phrase th_check_out_date_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="date" name="check_out_date" id="ctrl_check_out_date" class="textCtrl" value="{$checkOut.check_out_date}" /></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_out_due_date">{xen:phrase th_due_date_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="date" name="check_out_due_date" id="ctrl_check_out_due_date" class="textCtrl" value="{$checkOut.check_out_due_date}" /></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_out_location_{xen:if {$locations}, 'id', 'title'}">{xen:phrase th_check_out_location_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd> <xen:if is="{$locations}"> <select name="check_out_location_id" id="ctrl_check_out_location_id" class="textCtrl"> <xen:foreach loop="$locations" key="$locationId" value="$location"> <option value="{$locationId}"{xen:selected '{$checkOut.check_out_location_id} == {$locationId}'}>{$location.title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select> <xen:else /> <input type="textbox" name="check_out_location_title" value="{$checkOut.check_out_location_title}" class="textCtrl" /> </xen:if> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_out_condition_id">{xen:phrase th_resource_condition_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><select name="check_out_condition_id" id="ctrl_check_out_condition_id" class="textCtrl"> <xen:foreach loop="$conditions" key="$conditionId" value="$condition"> <option value="{$conditionId}"{xen:selected '{$checkOut.check_out_condition_id} == {$conditionId}'}>{$condition.title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_out_fee_amount">{xen:phrase th_fee_amount_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="check_out_fee_amount" value="{$checkOut.check_out_fee_amount}" size="3" class="textCtrl" id="ctrl_check_out_fee_amount"> <select name="check_out_fee_currency" class="textCtrl autoSize" id="ctrl_check_out_fee_currency"> <option value="usd">USD</option> </select> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_out_fee_payment_method_id">{xen:phrase th_fee_payment_method_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><select name="check_out_fee_payment_method_id" id="ctrl_check_out_fee_payment_method_id" class="textCtrl"> <xen:foreach loop="$paymentMethods" key="$paymentMethodId" value="$paymentMethod"> <option value="{$paymentMethodId}"{xen:selected '{$checkOut.check_out_fee_payment_method_id} == {$paymentMethodId}'}>{$paymentMethod.title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_out_deposit_amount">{xen:phrase th_deposit_amount_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="check_out_deposit_amount" value="{$checkOut.check_out_deposit_amount}" size="3" class="textCtrl" id="ctrl_check_out_deposit_amount"> <select name="check_out_deposit_currency" class="textCtrl autoSize" id="ctrl_check_out_deposit_currency"> <option value="usd">USD</option> </select> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_check_out_deposit_payment_method_id">{xen:phrase th_deposit_payment_method_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd><select name="check_out_deposit_payment_method_id" id="ctrl_check_out_deposit_payment_method_id" class="textCtrl"> <xen:foreach loop="$paymentMethods" key="$paymentMethodId" value="$paymentMethod"> <option value="{$paymentMethodId}"{xen:selected '{$checkOut.check_out_deposit_payment_method_id} == {$paymentMethodId}'}>{$paymentMethod.title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" name="save" value="{xen:phrase th_check_out_resource_rescheckinout}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:phrase th_checked_out_by_x_rescheckinout, 'name={xen:helper username, {xen:array "user_id={$resource.check_out_user_id}", "username={$resource.check_out_username}"}}'} {xen:phrase th_checked_out_to_x_rescheckinout, 'name={xen:helper username, {xen:array "user_id={$resource.check_out_to_user_id}", "username={$resource.check_out_to_username}"}}'} {xen:phrase th_checked_in_by_x_rescheckinout, 'name={xen:helper username, {xen:array "user_id={$resource.check_in_user_id}", "username={$resource.check_in_username}"}}'} {xen:phrase th_checked_in_from_x_rescheckinout, 'name={xen:helper username, {xen:array "user_id={$resource.check_in_from_user_id}", "username={$resource.check_in_from_username}"}}'} {xen:phrase th_check_in_rescheckinout}

modification.replace:
${1}
  • {xen:phrase th_check_outs_rescheckinout}
    • ${2}
  • {xen:phrase loading}...

modification.description: Adds condition text field to resource editor.
modification.replace: ${1} <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_resource_condition_id">{xen:phrase th_resource_condition_rescheckinout}:</label></dt> <dd> <select name="resource_condition_id" class="textCtrl" id="ctrl_resource_condition_id"> <option value="0"{xen:selected '!{$resource.condition_id_th}'}></option> <xen:foreach loop="$conditions" key="$conditionId" value="$condition"> <option value="{$conditionId}"{xen:selected '{$conditionId} == {$resource.condition_id_th}'}>{$condition.title}</option> </xen:foreach> </select> <input type="hidden" name="resource_condition_id_shown" value="1" /> </dd> </dl> ${2}

${0} <dl class="availability"><dt>{xen:phrase th_availability_rescheckinout}:</dt> <xen:if is="{$resource.check_in_user_id} || !{$resource.check_out_user_id}"> <dd>{xen:phrase th_available_rescheckinout}</dd> <xen:else /> <dd>{xen:phrase th_unavailable_rescheckinout}</dd> </xen:if> </dl> <xen:if is="{$resource.condition_title}"> <dl class="condition"><dt>{xen:phrase th_resource_condition_rescheckinout}:</dt> <dd>{$resource.condition_title}</dd> </dl> </xen:if>
